message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have a smaller share, but I'll give you a chance to accept a good offer!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still trying to get a good deal!
You're getting desperate, take it or leave it!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any more generous!
You're running out of time, take the deal or I'll get the whole thing!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not giving up yet!
You're almost out of options, take it or I'll take the whole thing!
